name: R U On The Right Track?
name_original: R U On The Right Track?
description:
"Billy was a young cube, a happy cube. Then one day, he found himself all alone."

Help Billy find his mother in this narrative runner game. Experience what it's like to grow up in cubeCity. And remember: life's challenges may seem hard at first, but the solution is always there, you just have to read the signs.

Game made in a week for the Community Game Jam 2019. Theme of jam: "The Game is a Liar". Inspired by Brackeys.

***Enjoy with your speakers on***
